notes: All pasta is fresh made in house using an Italian Bottene pasta machine.
All pizzas are made with Caputo flour from Napoli.
18% gratuity added to parties of 7 or more.

categories.name: Pasta
notes: Split plate charge for all pasta (optional): $4

items.name: Fettuccine Bolognese
items.description: Ground veal and sausage in signature marinara, infused with locally produced zinfandel wine, topped with asiago and basil.
